related-publication.not-saved: Publication with RDC-ID {{ id }} has not been saved!
related-publication.missing-id: Publication {{ index }} does not contain a RDC-ID and has not been saved!
related-publication.upload-terminated: Finished upload of {{ total }} Publications with {{ errors }} errors.

doi.size: The max length of the DOI of the Publication is 128 signs.
